lead_paragraph: As the pope approached the Russian patriarch, Francis was overheard to say, “Brother.” A moment later, he added, “Finally.”

byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow.

headline.print_headline: Pope and Russian Orthodox Leader Meet in Historic Step to Heal Rift
headline.main: Pope and Russian Orthodox Leader Meet in Historic Step

snippet: As the pope approached the Russian patriarch, Francis was overheard to say, “Brother.” A moment later, he added, “Finally.”
abstract: Pope Francis meets with Patriarch Kirill of the Russian Orthodox Church during visit to Havana; meeting, first between pontiff and patriarch of Russian Orthodox Church, represents step toward reconciliation of centuries-old division between faiths.
